alert.note: Alert for Wayne (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 18 at 11:44AM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...SNOW SHOWERS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF WAYNE...NORTHERN PREBLE AND SOUTHWESTERN DARKE COUNTIES THROUGH 1215 PM EST... At 1142 AM EST, snow showers were located along a line extending from near Union City to 9 miles southwest of Winchester to near Muncie, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds gusts up to 35 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Rapid reductions in visibility may cause travel difficulties. Locations impacted include... Richmond, Eaton, Centerville, Cambridge City, Arcanum, Lewisburg, Hagerstown, Union City, New Paris, New Madison, Fountain City, Dublin, Franklin, Wayne Lakes, Eldorado, Verona, Milton, West Manchester, Greens Fork, and East Germantown. This includes the following Interstates... I-70 in Indiana between mile markers 134 and 156. I-70 in Ohio between mile markers 0 and 16. Exercise extra caution while traveling. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
